com.itextpdf.text

Class Jpeg2000

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.itextpdf.text.Rectangle
      • com.itextpdf.text.Image
        • com.itextpdf.text.Jpeg2000
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Indentable, Spaceable, Element, IAccessibleElement, IAlternateDescription

    public class Jpeg2000
extends Image
    An Jpeg2000 is the representation of a graphic element (JPEG) that has to be inserted into the document
    See Also:
    Element, Image
